name: Loch Down
description:
Loch Down was created for GBJAM 8 from 29th August 2020 to 5th September 2020. 

Loch Down is a 2D platformer tower defense hybrid where you must get your capture units into the enemy base before theirs reaches yours.

Controls:

A/D || Left Arrow/Right Arrow- Horizontal movement.

W || Up Arrow - Aim up (when holding a gun)

Q - Jump

E - Shoot

Z || Space - Switch weapons/Spawn Units (when near your terminals)

X || Enter - Pause game/Start(when on title screen)

Art/Coding - Paul James Long (myself)

Music/SFX - Mairujyat

Font - Castpixel https://twitter.com/castpixel/status/1281345373336985612?s=19

Multiplayer to be developed, currently only single player
